Kirk Hinrich

Pronunciation: \HINE-rick\

Kirk James Hinrich

(Captain Kirk)

Position: Point Guard and Shooting Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-4, 190lb (193cm, 86kg)

Born: January 2, 1981 in Sioux City, Iowa us

College: Kansas

High School: Sioux City West in Sioux City, Iowa

Recruiting Rank: 1999 (62)

Draft: Chicago Bulls, 1st round (7th pick, 7th overall), 2003 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: November 7, 2003

Career Length: 13 years

  • 2003-04 All-Rookie
  • 2006-07 All-Defensive

How old is Kirk Hinrich?

Kirk Hinrich is 44 years old.

Where was Kirk Hinrich born?

Kirk Hinrich was born in Sioux City, Iowa.

Kirk Hinrich was born on January 2, 1981.

How tall is Kirk Hinrich?

Kirk Hinrich is 6-4 (193 cm) tall.

How much did Kirk Hinrich weigh when playing?

Kirk Hinrich weighed 190 lbs (86 kg) when playing.

Is Kirk Hinrich in the Hall of Fame?

Kirk Hinrich is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Kirk Hinrich drafted?

Kirk Hinrich was drafted by Chicago Bulls, 1st round (7th pick, 7th overall), 2003 NBA Draft.

What position did Kirk Hinrich play?

Point Guard and Shooting Guard.

When did Kirk Hinrich retire?

Kirk Hinrich last played in 2016.

What is Kirk Hinrich's net worth?

Kirk Hinrich made at least $71,692,268 playing professional basketball.

How much did Kirk Hinrich make?

Kirk Hinrich made $11,250,000 in 2008.

What did Kirk Hinrich average?

Kirk Hinrich averaged 10.9 points, 2.9 rebounds, and 4.8 assists per game.

How many rings does Kirk Hinrich have?

Kirk Hinrich won 0 championships.

What schools did Kirk Hinrich attend?

Kirk Hinrich attended Sioux City West in Sioux City, Iowa and Kansas.
